data.title: Fun time for all ages.
data.text: Staff was very friendly and helpful.   The four 16 year old girls I took  to this couldn't stop talking about how much fun they had. Us four mom's will be going next time.

data.title: Fun!
data.text: This was fun but bring your A game!  We ended up having to ask for hints ... but had so many more laughs!

data.title: Awesome experience
data.text: The Exit Room gives you a great feel as soon as you walk in. You know you are going to have fun, from the decorations in the lobby to the excellent staff. Can't recommend this place more highly!

data.title: Great experience!
data.text: We had 8 people in our group, and it took all 8 of us contributing to solve the clues! It was my first experience in this type of activity, and I thought it was great fun. Didn't take up the whole evening, and was a great start to an evening in downtown Lee's Summit! Only down side was they forgot to post our group photo to facebook and we were excited to watch for it. We finally had to call and ask them to post it, as we kept seeing others after us. Not a huge deal, but we were excited to have been there and wanted to let everyone know it was fun.

data.title: Very Fun
data.text: Very fun outing for friends or family.  The "watchers" are very patient and helpful when needed.  I can hardly wait to try the other rooms!

data.title: Exit Room
data.text: Fun for the whole family.  Suggest 6 people per room, even though more are allowed.  Rooms are tight and participation becomes difficult with too many people.  And this isn't a history test, just need to put on your problem solving hat.

owner_response.author: China A, Owner at The Exit Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your 5 Star review!  We really appreciate it.  We look forward to your returning for another adventure at The Exit Room.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Team Builder
data.text: Our three teams had a blast at the Exit Room. Staff members that don't ordinarily get the chance to work together were partners in their adventure.  Everyone said they would love the opportunity to do it again!

owner_response.author: China A, Owner at The Exit Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Kathy for your awesome review.  We loved having your teams and look forward to hosting you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Heist
data.text:
Great big puzzle, small rooms!
It would be neat if the rooms could be a little bigger and more expansive!
Also, if a puzzle had multiple parts to be worked on at once, this would be nice too, as some of our group weren't able to help out much. 
Art direction and the decoration of the room was okay. It could be a little more immersive. 
Overall, pleased with the first-ever experience of my first escape room!
Definitely revisiting this establishment again in the near future.
Fun times!!

owner_response.author: China A, Owner at The Exit Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your 5 star review.  We look forward to hosting you again and we would love to know what you think of our other rooms.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: I want to do it again!
data.text: This was so much fun for our extended family to do together! The atmosphere and decor set the stage from the moment we walked in. Some of the clues were really hard, but the gamemaster would occasionally give us just enough to keep us moving if we were really stuck. This was unlike anything I've done before and I want to go back and try a different room! Our young adult kids are already planning to go again with friends.

data.title: had a great time even tho we didn't get out !
data.text:
It is challenging would love to go back...
The more people you have with u the better .. would be awesome for team building.
We were so close !  We had me and my hubby, my son 20 , my daughter in law 21, friend 19 and daughter 15 ...

data.title: Surgery Room
data.text: It was a lot of fun, and challenging!  We will definitely be back!. And we made it out, just barely!  Thank you!

data.title: Great team builder!
data.text: My team of teachers had a blast working together to "exit" The Heist.  The staff was amazing and We will definitely be back!!

data.title: Great fun!
data.text: We thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience. From the time you first walk into the lobby you are swept into the mood.  The rooms were challenging and fun. The staff were awesome.  I would highly recommend this for many different types of groups. We had 2 adults and 4 teens.

data.title: Birthday Celebration
data.text: I sent all of my kids and their spouses and my sister and they all said they had and EXCELLENT time!!!!! They had so much fun. They even broke the standing record! Definitely recommend!

data.title: Ravenloft
data.text: Ravenloft was a creepily eerie yet fun experience and we're all waiting for the Grey project to open up to do it all again. Well worth the time and money. FUN

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: If you want something fun for a group of people to do this is the place! I have been 2x already and planning a 3rd visit soon!

data.title: Good place for Newbies
data.text: Rooms are very logical and straight forward.  They really help you along to get to the end.  Get for families and first timers to escape rooms.

data.title: Best one in KC!
data.text: Great family fun! The puzzles are challenging but fair! Such a rush when you break free before the 60 minutes are up!

data.title: Super fun!
data.text: Staff was courteous... Game was excellent! I want to go back and complete the other room adventures! Definitely recommend!

data.title: Fun time for all!
data.text: We took our middle and high school youth groups and everyone had an excellent time!  The staff was great, the atmosphere was awesome.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
